titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to eliminate the temporary increase in unemployment tax.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 11/16/2009--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the temporary (through June 2011) increase in the rate of the unemployment tax (thus reducing such rate from 6.2% to 6.0% of total wages).
